snippet: Joseph J. Lhota helped format the Police Department’s monthly crime statistics for CompStat, the management system that was a tool in crime control.
abstract: Republican Joseph J Lhota, New York City mayoral candidate, cites his role in creation of CompStat management system as one of his qualifications for the job but also admits he had minor job of figuring out a one-page format for crime statistics reports; remarks come in debate with Democratic rival Bill de Blasio, with Lhota focusing on his experience in  criminal justice issues.
lead_paragraph: Joseph J. Lhota helped format the Police Department’s monthly crime statistics for CompStat, the management system that was a tool in crime control.

headline.main: Lhota Explains Role in Crime Data
headline.print_headline: Lhota Explains Role in Crime Data
